A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Welp\, it sucked.  Weak character development\, cheesy scenes and lines\, misplaced humor and PC propaganda galore.\n\nIf I wanted to get a dose of poitics\, I'd tune into NPR.  All you had to do was give Luke and Leia a proper sendoff and develop the cast from TFA.  Instead we got the new ploy to spend money on Disney merchandise\, AKA Porgs and very forgettable new people.......as in I don't know their names - just purple-haired admiral and token minority who could give Jar Jar Binks a run for most annoying in the galaxy.  They did Luke a dirty with his role in this movie.  He deserved better.
